00005 def genLevel():
00006     randNum = random.random()
00007     level = []
00008     count = 0
00009     if randNum < 0.20:
00010         randNum = 0.0
00011         splitter = 1
00012     elif randNum > 0.75:
00013         randNum = 1.0
00014         splitter = 1
00015     else:
00016         splitter = random.randint(1,2)
00017         count = 1
00018 
00019     level.append(splitter)
00020     level.append(randNum)
00021     level.append(count)
00022     
00023     return level

00025 def createIndividual(maxDepth, maxRoom, minRoom):
00026 
00027     flag = 0
00028 
00029     while(flag == 0):
00030 
00031         tree,level,count = [], [], []
00032         level = genLevel()
00033         ctr=sum(level[-1:])
00034 
00035         tree.append(level[:-1])
00036         level = []
00037         Depth = 0
00038 
00039         while(ctr>0 and Depth<maxDepth):
00040             count = ctr
00041             ctr = 0
00042             tempTree = []
00043             for k in range(2*count):
00044                 level = genLevel()
00045                 ctr = ctr + sum(level[-1:])
00046                 tempTree.append(level[:-1])
00047                 level = []
00048             Depth = Depth + 1
00049             tree.append(tempTree)
00050 
00051 
00052         roomCount = 0
00053         if (Depth > 1 and Depth < maxDepth):
00054             for k in xrange(1,len(tree)):
00055                 for j in xrange(len(tree[k])):
00056                     if tree[k][j][1] == 1.0:
00057                         roomCount = roomCount + 1
00058 
00059             if roomCount > minRoom and roomCount < maxRoom:
00060                 flag = 1
00061 
00062     #print "FINAL TREE:", tree
00063     #print "FINAL DEPTH:", Depth
00064 
00065     return tree
